title: Pilot Family Questions
blurb: Questions we asked regarding families during the pilot.
text: This category shows the data for all of the questions we asked of families during the pilot.

i.title: Family Engagement
i.text: How engaged are families in the school community?

ii.title: Family Sense of Belonging
ii.text: Would families like to get more involved with the school?

iii.title: Untapped Family Capacity
iii.text: Do families feel the school cares about them and how do they feel about the school?
